channel.title: [Req]Logo and Splash for Pivot
channel.description:
Hey; I'm in need of a high-quality logo and splash screen for Pivot, and think that it would be better looking if I didn't make it lol.
The theme for the visual aspects of Pivot are going to be dark red and orange. I haven't finished thinking of a logo, but I think a crosshair-like thing would be cool. In the splash screen, I'd like it to be 455x296 or so. I would like it to have the logo somewhere in there, at a pretty decent size. If you could animate it that would be a GIGANTIC thank you. The reason I thought that the crosshair idea would be good would be because you could animate it to spin a little and shrink a bit (as if zooming in) in the splash screen, which would go with the name "Pivot". If you could include in the animation a glow effect that rises and then dims on the word Pivot that would be lovely. I would also REALLY love some text in the bottom left saying "Please wait while Pivot loads..." and I think an animated glow effect on this would be spectacular. Please also include a standard size icon also so I could integrate it.
Of course whoever does this will receive FULL credits for his/her work once Pivot is completed, and will not be forgotten in the credits file.
Sidenote --
Please do not put your name on the splash or logo. I want you to be recognized, but if it was done in this way, users might believe Pivot was made by you. ;) I don't want to put my name on it either, because more people might become involved in Pivot. However, when I make a credits file, you WILL be given FULL credits for the splash and logo.

item.title: [Req]Logo and Splash for Pivot
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Sepranem:

Mmkay; until you’re done with that, I wouldn’t mind other people trying out too.

Yeh sorry ill work on it a few hours.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req]Logo and Splash for Pivot
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Sepranem, post:5, topic:35934”]Thanks to both of you guys; I like them. I feel like there’s too much negative space in 'em though.

A few suggestions:

#Change font into something more…complex? I guess.
#Round all the edges.
#Move text more towards the center of the splash.
#Make a modified crosshair that will spin and shrink (not too fast) as if zooming.
#Put a slow but large glow effect on “Pivot”.
#Use the colors usernamelol used.

I am very grateful that you guys are helping, but I think it would be perfect if you could use those suggestions.

Thanks! :D[/quote]
Ill do some of that in a second.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req]Logo and Splash for Pivot
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

Thanks to both of you guys; I like them. I feel like there’s too much negative space in 'em though.

A few suggestions:

#Change font into something more…complex? I guess.
#Round all the edges.
#Move text more towards the center of the splash.
#Make a modified crosshair that will spin and shrink (not too fast) as if zooming.
#Put a slow but large glow effect on “Pivot”.
#Use the colors usernamelol used.

I am very grateful that you guys are helping, but I think it would be perfect if you could use those suggestions.

Thanks!
